mapper.sql: money AS "money", coding AS "coding",adress_id AS "adressId", procurement_order_id AS "procurementOrderId", procurement_plan_id AS "procurementPlanId", status AS "status", note AS "note", display AS "display", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_procurement_order where 1 = 1
and procurement_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.procurementOrderId},'%')
and procurement_plan_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.procurementPlanId},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.status},'%')
and note like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.note},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
